android.car.hardware.hvac

类 CarHvacManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.hardware.hvac.CarHvacManager

  • public final class CarHvacManager
extends CarManagerBase
    API for controlling HVAC system in cars

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CarHvacManager.CarHvacEventCallback
      Application registers CarHvacManager.CarHvacEventCallback object to receive updates and changes to subscribed Car HVAC properties.
      static interface  CarHvacManager.PropertyId

      空调面板按键有效请求

      反馈：
      0x0=inactive;0x1=K_ON_OFF;0x2=K_DEF;0x3=K_AUTO;0x4=K_REC;0x5=K_DrTEMP;0x6=K_PaTEMP;0x7=K_FAN;0x8=K_A.C;0x9=K_MODE;0xA=K_IONIZER;0xB=K_MAX A.C;0xC=K_AQS;0xD=K_SYNC
      获取 getIntProperty(int, int);监听CarPropertyManager.registerListener(CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener, int, float)
      static int ID_HVAC_ACTIVE_VENTILATION_ON
      CA-IF
      解锁主动换气开关

      val 参数取值:HvacDefine.HvacPropertyValue
      area 取值 VehicleAreaType.VEHICLE_AREA_TYPE_GLOBAL
      定制编号:FW-GRP-HVAC-001_15-F_ORG_P_EXT

      CA-IF
      空调自干燥功能

      属性取值参考:HvacDefine.HvacPropertyValue
      area 取值 VehicleAreaType.VEHICLE_AREA_TYPE_GLOBAL
      定制编号:FW-GRP-HVAC-001_16-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_HVAC_AIR_QUALITY_IN_OUT_CAR
      CA-IF
      获取车内外PM2.5值
      0x000~0x3E8=0~1000；0x3FF=invalid
      监听CarPropertyManager.registerListener(CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener, int, float),获取 getIntProperty(int, int)
      area 取值： 车内 android.car.VehicleAreaInOutCAR#InOutCAR_INSIDE，车外 android.car.VehicleAreaInOutCAR#InOutCAR_OUTSIDE
      定制编号:FW-GRP-HVAC-001_17-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_HVAC_AIR_QUALITY_RATING_INNER
      CA-IF
      车内空气质量等级（未实现，通过PM2.5判断）
      数据类型: int
      area 取值 VehicleAreaType.VEHICLE_AREA_TYPE_GLOBAL
      定制编号:FW-GRP-HVAC-001_19-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_HVAC_APU_CTR
      CA-IF
      香氛功能控制
      设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int),获取 getIntProperty(int, int)
      属性取值参考:
      设置：
      areaId=0x00,value=HU_Request_AFUSt:香氛开启请求，0x1：OFF;0x2：ON
      areaId=0x01,value=HU_Request_AFUContentleve:香氛浓度控制，0x1-0x3档
      areaId=0x02,value=HU_Request_AFUchannel:香氛通道选择，0x1-0x3通道
      areaId=0x03,data[0]=HU_Request_AFUSt,data[1]=HU_Request_AFUContentleve,data[2]=HU_Request_AFUchannel setIntArrayProperty(int, int, int[])
      反馈：
      areaId=0x00,value=AC_WorkingSt_AFU:香氛开关状态,0x0：OFF；0x1：ON
      areaId=0x01,value=AC_ContentLevel_AFU：香氛浓度,0x1-0x3档
      areaId=0x02,value=AC_Channel_AFU：香氛通道，0x1-0x3通道
      areaId=0x10,value=AC_Type_Channel1_AFU：通道1香型,0x1-0x7=type1-type7
      areaId=0x11,value=AC_Type_Channel2_AFU：通道2香型,0x1-0x7=type1-type7
      areaId=0x12,value=AC_Type_Channel3_AFU：通道3香型,0x1-0x7=type1-type7
      area 取值如上
      static int ID_HVAC_AQS_MODE_ON
      CA-IF
      AQS开关
      设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int),获取 getIntProperty(int, int)
      空调APP val取值使用:HvacDefine.HvacPropertyValue.REQUEST
      area 取值 VehicleAreaType.VEHICLE_AREA_TYPE_GLOBAL
      定制编号:FW-GRP-HVAC-001_20-F_ORG_P_EXT

      static int ID_HVAC_ENG_HEAT_TEMP_CFG
      CA-IF
      空调发动机采暖温度设置
      设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int),获取 getIntProperty(int, int)
      属性取值参考:
      设置：
      areaId=0x00,value=HU_ACEngHelpHeatTempAdjustValueReq(0x0= inactive;0x1~0x1F=-30℃~0℃)
      反馈：
      areaId=0x00,value=AC_EngHelpHeatTempAdjustValue(0x0=Reserve;0x1~0x1F=-30℃~0℃)
      area 取值如上
      static int ID_HVAC_FAN_SPEED_ACK
      CA-IF
      风量等级状态反馈
      监听CarPropertyManager.registerListener(CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener, int, float),获取 getIntProperty(int, int)
      val 参数取值：0表示OFF（暂无此需求）,1-8档位，9=Level0扇叶（按OFF处理）
      area：前排 VehicleAreaSeat.SEAT_ROW_FRONT，后排 VehicleAreaSeat.SEAT_ROW_REAR
      定制编号:FW-GRP-HVAC-001_34-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_HVAC_FAN_SPEED_ADJUST
      CA-IF
      风量档位控制加减
      设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int)
      风量状态获取请通过ID_HVAC_FAN_SPEED_ACK
      val 参数：设置1-N档位；0xAA=DOWN；0xBB=UP;
      反馈：val 参数取值：0表示OFF,1-8档位，9=Level0扇叶（按OFF处理）
      area：前排 VehicleAreaSeat.SEAT_ROW_FRONT，后排 VehicleAreaSeat.SEAT_ROW_REAR
      定制编号:FW-GRP-HVAC-001_23-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_HVAC_FRONTWIND_SHIELD_WARM
      CA-IF
      前挡玻璃加热
      设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int),获取 getIntProperty(int, int)
      属性取值参考:0x0=inactive； 0x1=on； 0x2=off
      area 取值 VehicleAreaType.VEHICLE_AREA_TYPE_GLOBAL
      定制编号:FW-GRP-HVAC-001_24-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_HVAC_FRONTWIND_SHIELD_WARM_TIME
      CA-IF
      前挡玻璃加热时间
      属性取值参考:

      设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int)
      static int ID_HVAC_HOT_COLD_SET
      CA-IF
      制冷制热模式设定请求\反馈

      static int ID_HVAC_IN_OUT_TEMP
      CA-IF
      车内/外温度

      static int ID_LCK_WARNING_TONE_FUNC
      CA-IF

      反馈：
      areaId=0x00,value=0x0BDC_LckWarningToneFuncSts 闭锁提示音功能设置状态(0x0=关闭；0x1=开启)

      CA-IF

      属性取值参考:

      area 取值如上
      static int ID_SMART_SPEED_LIMIT
      CA-IF
      智能限速相关
      属性取值参考:
      设置：
      areaId=0x00,value=HU_IgSpeedLimSetSw 智能限速软开关设置信号(CarValue)
      areaId=0x01,value=HU_IgSpeedLimSet 智能限速车速设置信号(0x0=Invalid;0x1=30km/h;0x2=35km/h;0x3=40km/h;0x4=45km/h;……………………;0x20=185km/h;0x21-0x2F= Reserved)
      areaId=0x02,value=HU_IgSpeedLimRemd 智能限速提醒信号(0x0=invalid;0x1=限速提醒;0x2=Reserved;0x3=Reserved)
      areaId=0x03,value=Reserve
      反馈：
      areaId=0x00,value=EMS_IgSpeedLimSetFb 智能限速软开关设置反馈信号(CarValue)
      areaId=0x01,value=EMS_IgSpeedLimFb 智能限速车速设置反馈信号(0x0=Invalid;0x1=30km/h;0x2=35km/h;0x3=40km/h;0x4=45km/h;……………………;0x20=185km/h;0x21-0x3F=Reserved)
      areaId=0x02,value=Reserve
      areaId=0x03,value=EMS_IgSpeedExRemd 智能限速超速提醒(0x0=invalid;0x1=超速提醒;0x2=Reserved;0x3=Reserved)
      设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int);获取 getIntProperty(int, int);监听CarPropertyManager.registerListener(CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener, int, float)
      static int ID_STEERING_WHEEL_HEAT
      Steering wheel temp, int type Positive values indicate heating.
      static int ID_STEERING_WHEEL_HEAT_SET
      CA-IF
      方向盘加热设置
      设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int);获取 getIntProperty(int, int);监听CarPropertyManager.registerListener(CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener, int, float)
      属性取值参考:
      设置：
      areaId=0x00,value=HU_SteerWheelHeatSet(0x0=inactive;0x1=off;0x2=on;0x3=Reserve)
      反馈：
      areaId=0x00,value=BCM_SteerWheelHeatDisplay(0x0=inactive;0x1=off;0x2=on;0x3=Reserve)
      areaId=0x01,value=BCM_SteerWheelHeat_Status(0x0=unheated;0x1=heating;0x2=unallowed;0x3=finished;0x4=short circuit;0x5=open circuit;0x6=NTC error;0x7=other error)
      area 取值如上
      static int ID_TEMPERATURE_DISPLAY_UNITS
      Temperature units being used, int type 0x30 = Celsius 0x31 = Fahrenheit
      static int ID_TILT_DOWNWARD_SWITCH
      CA-IF
      主驾座椅前端向下调节
      属性取值参考:
      设置：
      0x0=No press;0x1=press
      设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int)
      static int ID_TILT_UPWARD_SWITCH
      CA-IF
      主驾座椅前端向上调节
      属性取值参考:
      设置：
      0x0=No press;0x1=press
      设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int)
      static int ID_VEH_SPDLIMTD_REQ_SWITCH
      CA-IF

      设置/反馈：
      0x0=inactive;0x1=未限速;0x2=限速80km/h
      设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int);获取 getIntProperty(int, int);监听CarPropertyManager.registerListener(CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener, int, float)
      static int ID_WINDOW_DEFROSTER_ON
      CA-IF
      前/后除霜开关

      area 取值：前除霜 VehicleAreaWindow.WINDOW_FRONT_WINDSHIELD 后除霜 VehicleAreaWindow.WINDOW_REAR_WINDSHIELD
      定制编号:FW-GRP-HVAC-001_6-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_ZONED_AC_ON

      CA-IF
      温度控制/读取（主驾/副驾,后排，自动空调）/语音调节温度
      属性取值参考:
      设置：
      value=(0x01=LO(17.5);0x02-0x1E=18~32℃;0x1F=HIGH(32.5);0X30=Up Req;0x31=Down Req)
      获取：
      value=(0x00=LO;0x01-0x1D=18~32℃;0x1E=HIGH;0x1F=Invalid)

      area:主驾 VehicleAreaSeat.SEAT_MAIN_DRIVER，副驾 VehicleAreaSeat.SEAT_PASSENGER，
      后排 VehicleAreaSeat.SEAT_ROW_REAR
      定制编号:FW-GRP-HVAC-001_26-F_ORG_P_EXT

      • ID_HVAC_FAN_SPEED_ADJUST

        public static final int ID_HVAC_FAN_SPEED_ADJUST
        CA-IF
        风量档位控制加减
        设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int)
        风量状态获取请通过ID_HVAC_FAN_SPEED_ACK
        val 参数：设置1-N档位；0xAA=DOWN；0xBB=UP;
        反馈：val 参数取值：0表示OFF,1-8档位，9=Level0扇叶（按OFF处理）
        area：前排 VehicleAreaSeat.SEAT_ROW_FRONT，后排 VehicleAreaSeat.SEAT_ROW_REAR
        定制编号:FW-GRP-HVAC-001_23-F_ORG_P_EXT
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        public static final int ID_HVAC_APU_CTR
        CA-IF
        香氛功能控制
        设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int),获取 getIntProperty(int, int)
        属性取值参考:
        设置：
        areaId=0x00,value=HU_Request_AFUSt:香氛开启请求，0x1：OFF;0x2：ON
        areaId=0x01,value=HU_Request_AFUContentleve:香氛浓度控制，0x1-0x3档
        areaId=0x02,value=HU_Request_AFUchannel:香氛通道选择，0x1-0x3通道
        areaId=0x03,data[0]=HU_Request_AFUSt,data[1]=HU_Request_AFUContentleve,data[2]=HU_Request_AFUchannel setIntArrayProperty(int, int, int[])
        反馈：
        areaId=0x00,value=AC_WorkingSt_AFU:香氛开关状态,0x0：OFF；0x1：ON
        areaId=0x01,value=AC_ContentLevel_AFU：香氛浓度,0x1-0x3档
        areaId=0x02,value=AC_Channel_AFU：香氛通道，0x1-0x3通道
        areaId=0x10,value=AC_Type_Channel1_AFU：通道1香型,0x1-0x7=type1-type7
        areaId=0x11,value=AC_Type_Channel2_AFU：通道2香型,0x1-0x7=type1-type7
        areaId=0x12,value=AC_Type_Channel3_AFU：通道3香型,0x1-0x7=type1-type7
        area 取值如上

        常量字段值

      • ID_SMART_SPEED_LIMIT

        public static final int ID_SMART_SPEED_LIMIT
        CA-IF
        智能限速相关
        属性取值参考:
        设置：
        areaId=0x00,value=HU_IgSpeedLimSetSw 智能限速软开关设置信号(CarValue)
        areaId=0x01,value=HU_IgSpeedLimSet 智能限速车速设置信号(0x0=Invalid;0x1=30km/h;0x2=35km/h;0x3=40km/h;0x4=45km/h;……………………;0x20=185km/h;0x21-0x2F= Reserved)
        areaId=0x02,value=HU_IgSpeedLimRemd 智能限速提醒信号(0x0=invalid;0x1=限速提醒;0x2=Reserved;0x3=Reserved)
        areaId=0x03,value=Reserve
        反馈：
        areaId=0x00,value=EMS_IgSpeedLimSetFb 智能限速软开关设置反馈信号(CarValue)
        areaId=0x01,value=EMS_IgSpeedLimFb 智能限速车速设置反馈信号(0x0=Invalid;0x1=30km/h;0x2=35km/h;0x3=40km/h;0x4=45km/h;……………………;0x20=185km/h;0x21-0x3F=Reserved)
        areaId=0x02,value=Reserve
        areaId=0x03,value=EMS_IgSpeedExRemd 智能限速超速提醒(0x0=invalid;0x1=超速提醒;0x2=Reserved;0x3=Reserved)
        设置 setIntProperty(int, int, int);获取 getIntProperty(int, int);监听CarPropertyManager.registerListener(CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener, int, float)
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FAN_DIRECTION_FACE

        public static final int FAN_DIRECTION_FACE
        Use CarHvacFanDirection.FACE instead. Represents fan direction when air flows through face directed vents. This constant must be used with ID_ZONED_FAN_DIRECTION property.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FAN_DIRECTION_FLOOR

        public static final int FAN_DIRECTION_FLOOR
        Use CarHvacFanDirection.FLOOR instead. Represents fan direction when air flows through floor directed vents. This constant must be used with ID_ZONED_FAN_DIRECTION property.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FAN_DIRECTION_DEFROST

        public static final int FAN_DIRECTION_DEFROST
        Use CarHvacFanDirection.DEFROST instead. Represents fan direction when air flows through defrost vents. This constant must be used with ID_ZONED_FAN_DIRECTION property.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        public void registerCallback(CarHvacManager.CarHvacEventCallback callback)

        抛出:
        CarNotConnectedException

      • unregisterCallback

        public void unregisterCallback(CarHvacManager.CarHvacEventCallback callback)
        Stop getting property updates for the given callback. If there are multiple registrations for this listener, all listening will be stopped.
        参数:
        callback -

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase
